      • processInquiry

        public final ServersResponse<DTO> processInquiry(ClientsInquiry<? extends AbstractDTO> clientsInquiry)
        This is the only method that should be called for data retrieval/insertion/deletion/... This method prepares a statement and processes the query.
        Parameters:
        clientsInquiry - the client's inquiry to be processed.
        Returns:
        a response to send to the client.

      • getOne

        public DTO getOne(java.sql.PreparedStatement statement)
        Each connection must be closed after each execution of a SQL query. Also, each ResultSet must be closed. The way it happens here is by declaring them inside "()" of the try clause.

      • getOne

        public DTO getOne(java.sql.Connection connection,
                  java.sql.PreparedStatement statement)
        Each connection must be closed after each execution of a SQL query. Also, each ResultSet must be closed. The way it happens here is by declaring them inside "()" of the try clause.
